/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with modern buildings, their facades predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and blue accents that add a touch of vibrancy to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active transportation system. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day, and trees can be seen in the background, adding a touch of nature to the concrete jungle.
